evidence.claim: Cheer Home Care engages in health-tech integration via systems compliant with HIPAA regulations.
The company employs EHRs for patient management and records handling, suggesting adherence to healthcare data standards.
Cheer Home Care's technology is designed to ensure patient data privacy and security, aligning with health-tech standards.
